sentences.en: A comparative study on the disintegration of filamentous fungi.
sentences.cn: 中译:一项关于纤维状真菌裂解的比较研究.

sentences.en: A nice trip to the theatre reduced to marital disintegration in minutes.
sentences.cn: 本应是一次美好的剧院之行却在几分钟内导致了婚姻的破裂.

sentences.en: And isn't this just another indication of the inevitable disintegration of the present time?
sentences.cn: “这就是现今这时代不可避免的分化不是? ”

sentences.en: Complete disintegration of cytoplasm of crescent or irregular shape of microspore .25.
sentences.cn: 月牙形和不规则形小孢子细胞质完全解体.

sentences.en: Friction on the cost reduction team invariably leads to the disintegration of the project.
sentences.cn: 降低成本小组内部的摩擦就会导致项目的失败.

sentences.en: Is it the first signal of relationship disintegration?
sentences.cn: 这是关系瓦解的第一个讯号吗？

sentences.en: It may develop in place by the decay and disintegration of bedrock.
sentences.cn: 它可能是通过基岩的腐蚀和崩解就地生成的.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To compare several METHODS : ameliorating the disintegration of calcium citrate tablet.
sentences.cn: 目的: 比较几种改善构橼酸钙片崩解度的方法.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To improve the gross deviation and disintegration of cyclandelate capsules.
sentences.cn: 目的: 改善环扁桃酯胶囊的装量差异及崩解时限.

sentences.en: Primary function terminated when Rubikon disintegration reached three cubits inwards and increasing.
sentences.cn: 卢比刚分解达向内三腕尺以上时,主要功能中断.

sentences.en: Some theorists call this the " vertical disintegration of production across borders ".
sentences.cn: 因而,有部分理论家将此表述为 “ 垂直非一体化的跨国生产 ”,这实在太复杂了.

sentences.en: Suddenly, with war on the horizon, the army seemed in danger of disintegration.
sentences.cn: 随着战争即将爆发，军队似乎突然面临分崩离析的危险。

sentences.en: The act or an instance of breaking up, as a division, dispersal, or disintegration.
sentences.cn: 分散，分离分离的行为或实例，如分裂、分散或分解。

sentences.en: The incident has hastened the disintegration of the club.
sentences.cn: 这一事件加速了该俱乐部的解体.

sentences.en: The total collapse of the Iron Curtain and the Berlin Wall came in 1989-1990, but the disintegration externally and internally started during my Administration.
sentences.cn: 铁幕政策和柏林墙的全线坍塌发生在1989年到1990年，但是我执政期间就已经开始内在和外在的瓦解。

sentences.en: There is little we can do to stop this natural disintegration of the continents.
sentences.cn: 我们难以阻止这种陆地的自然蜕变作用.

sentences.en: These years witnessed the disintegration and destruction of the English peasantry.
sentences.cn: 农民正在经历解体和毁灭.

sentences.en: This defeat led to the disintegration of the empire.
sentences.cn: 这次战败导致了帝国的瓦解.

words.tran_cn: 使分解；使碎裂；使崩溃；使衰变
